text: "Make It with You" is a 1970 song by American band Bread. It was taken from their second studio album On the Waters. It went to number 1 in the United States, number 2 in Canada, number 5 in the United Kingdom, number 6 in New Zealand, number 7 in Australia and number 10 in Ireland. It was their only number 1 song in the United States. ==References== Category:1970 songs Category:Soft rock songs Category:Bread (band) songs Category:Andy Williams songs Category:Teddy Pendergrass songs
title: Make It with You
